attributes.action: publicise the role of Sybil the cat, Chief Mouser of the Cabinet Office.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: We believe that Sybil the cat, owned by the Darlings, has an important role in the running of every day government, despite the very minimal role she plays. We request that Mr Gordon Brown does his best to inform the public of this fact.

reasons: Intended to be humorous, or has no point about government policy
